SECTION_CONTENT:
10.1. Reactivity
Reacts with water to form corrosive acids. Corrosive vapors. Thermal decomposition generates:
10.2. Chemical stability
Stable under normal conditions. Not established.
10.3. Possibility of hazardous reactions
May react violently with reducing agents. Can form explosive mixtures with flammable materials. Not established.
10.4. Conditions to avoid
Moisture. Direct sunlight. Extremely high or low temperatures.
10.5. Incompatible materials
Combustible materials. Flammable materials. Reducing agents. Strong acids. Strong bases.
10.6. Hazardous decomposition products
Under normal conditions of storage and use, hazardous decomposition products should not be produced. fume. Carbon monoxide. Carbon dioxide.
Thermal decomposition generates: Corrosive vapors.
